Some assistive technologies may require the use of a passthrough function before this keystroke. For more information, activate the button labeled "Explore your accessibility options".

Election Information
====================

For language translation of this page, please click on the Google translation icon located on the lower left corner of your screen.

Para la traducción del idioma de esta página, haga clic en el icono de traducción de Google situado en la esquina inferior izquierda de la pantalla.

Để dịch trang này sang ngôn ngữ khác, vui lòng nhấp vào biểu tượng dịch thuật của Google nằm ở góc dưới bên trái màn hình của bạn

Upcoming Elections
==================

[MAY 2, 2026 - General Election](https://www.haslet.org/662/10523/May-2-2026-General-Election)
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Required Election Information: Secretary of State Form I-20
-----------------------------------------------------------

In compliance with H.B. No. 305/Local Government Code Sec. 2051.152 (effective September 1, 2019) - Internet Posting Requirement

* [English Version](https://www.haslet.org/DocumentCenter/View/5781/Form-I-20-2026)
* [Spanish Version](https://www.haslet.org/DocumentCenter/View/5779/Form-I-20-2026-Spanish-Version)
* [Vietnamese Version](https://www.haslet.org/DocumentCenter/View/5780/Form-I-20-2026-Vietnamese-Version)
